participant_1.background:
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.
I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.
I use my imagination to dance in my head.
i am nearly 6 tall.

participant_2.background:
I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.
I listen to my favorite music from my childhood.
i want people to notice me.
I was so proud of myself when I won the spelling bee.
i hate fast food.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage.
That's really cool! I'm not very creative, but I like to listen to music from my childhood.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like pop music from the 80s.
I love the 80s! I was born in 1983, so I grew up listening to that music.
Me too! I was born in 1984. What's your favorite song from the 80s?
I have so many favorites, but I think "Careless Whisper" by George Michael is my all-time favorite.
That's a great song! I love that one too.
What are some of your other favorite songs from the 80s?
I love "Girls Just Want to Have Fun" by Cyndi Lauper, "Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This)" by Eurythmics, and "Tainted Love" by Soft Cell.
Those are all great songs! I love them too.
Me too! We should listen to some of them later.
That would be fun! I'd love to hear some of your favorite songs.
Great! I'll bring my playlist over next time we hang out.
Sounds good! I can't wait to hear it
